name: Mvngata Beach Hotel
address: Cerrada Zona Costera lote 21, manzana 91, 77727 Playa del Carmen, Quintana Roo
description: Located in Playa del Carmen, Mvngata Beach Hotel provides accommodation with a restaurant, free private parking, an outdoor swimming pool and a bar. Among the various facilities of this property are a shared lounge, a garden and a private beach area. The accommodation features a 24-hour front desk, room service and currency exchange for guests. All units are equipped with air conditioning, a flat-screen TV with satellite channels, a coffee machine, a shower, a hairdryer and a wardrobe. At the hotel every room comes with a private bathroom with free toiletries. A à la carte breakfast is available daily at Mvngata Beach Hotel. The accommodation offers a terrace. Cancun International Airport is 51 km from the property.

name: Mayab Playa - 5th. Ave
address: 2 Quinta Avenida 5Ta Avenida esquina con Calle 2, 77710 Playa del Carmen, Quintana Roo
description: Ideally set in Playa del Carmen, MAYAB Playa - 5Th. Ave features air-conditioned rooms, a terrace, free WiFi and a restaurant. This 5-star hotel offers room service. Some units at the property have a balcony with a city view. At the hotel, the rooms are fitted with a wardrobe, a flat-screen TV, a private bathroom, bed linen and towels. Popular points of interest near MAYAB Playa - 5Th. Ave include Playacar Beach, ADO International Bus Station and Playa del Carmen Maritime Terminal. The nearest airport is Cozumel International Airport, 34 km from the accommodation.

name: Hotel Xcaret Arte - Adults Only
address: Carr. Chetumal - Puerto Juárez Km. 282, 77710 Playa del Carmen, Quintana Roo
description: Located in Playa del Carmen, 8.8 km from Playa del Carmen Maritime Terminal, Hotel Xcaret Arte - All Parks All Fun Inclusive - Adults Only provides accommodation with free bikes, free private parking, a fitness centre and a garden. Providing a restaurant, the property also has a terrace, as well as a sauna and a hot tub. The accommodation features a 24-hour front desk, airport transfers, room service and free WiFi throughout the property. The hotel offers certain rooms with sea views, and each room is equipped with a balcony. Guest rooms at Hotel Xcaret Arte - All Parks All Fun Inclusive - Adults Only include air conditioning and a wardrobe. Breakfast is available daily, and includes continental, vegan and gluten-free options. You can play tennis at this 5-star hotel, and the area is popular for snorkelling and cycling. ADO International Bus Station is 9 km from the accommodation, while Church of Guadalupe is 11 km away. The nearest airport is Cozumel International Airport, 27 km from Hotel Xcaret Arte - All Parks All Fun Inclusive - Adults Only.

name: Playa Palms Beach Hotel
address: 1st Avenue Bis, 77710 Playa del Carmen, Quintana Roo
description: Offering an outdoor pool and a private beach area with stunning views of the sea, Playa Palms Beach Hotel is situated steps from famous 5th Avenue and its cafeterias, shops and nightclubs. Free WiFi is available throughput. All units are air conditioned and include a seating and/or dining area, equipped with a flat screen TV. Some units also have a kitchen, fitted with a toaster. All rooms come with a balcony, hammocks and some have partial sea views or garden views. There is a variety of drinks offered at an extra cost. Spa services and a tour desk are available. Playa Palms Beach Hotel is about 60 minutes’ drive from Cancun International Airport.

name: Maroma, A Belmond Hotel, Riviera Maya
address: Carretera Cancun Tulum Km 51, 77710 Playa del Carmen, Quintana Roo
description: Spend the day catching some rays at Maroma, A Belmond Hotel, Riviera Maya's private sand beach, relaxing by one of the aparthotel's 3 outdoor swimming pools, or pampering yourself at the full-service spa. Each apartment features free WiFi, a furnished patio, and a pillowtop bed. Comforts include premium bedding and a pillow menu, and guests will also appreciate thoughtful touches like bathrobes and slippers.Expedia

name: Hotel Cielo
address: Calle 4Norte Entre 5ta Y 10av - Col, 77710 Playa del Carmen, Quintana Roo
description: Free Wi-Fi and cable TV are included in each air-conditioned room at this charming small hotel. Located just 50 metres from Playa del Carmen Beach, it has authentic Mexican-style décor. Hotel Cielo’s bright rooms offer colourful local décor, tiled floors and a safe. Some rooms have a balcony with sea views. Toiletries and free beach towels are provided. Guests will enjoy the Carboncitos bar-restaurant, located on the ground floor. It specializes in Mexican cuisine and also serving steak and seafood dishes, including typical snacks like fresh guacamole made to order. A wide range of shops, restaurants and bars can be found on Fifth Avenue, less than a minute’s walk from Hotel Cielo. Nuestra Señora del Carmen Church is only 300 metres away. located 2 blocks from the ADO Bus Station. The Beach is a block away from the hotel. Holistic center, Wah Wah, Tarraya are nearest beach side restaurants and bars.

name: Secrets Moxché Playa del Carmen
address: Carretera Playa del Carmen-Cancun KM 294, Corasol, 77714 Playa del Carmen, Quintana Roo
description: Exquisite taste and exotic views will capture your heart at Secrets Moxché. Escape into luxury™ in the heart of the Riviera Maya, just a 10-minute drive from Playa del Carmen's famed Quinta Avenida (Fifth Avenue), and indulge with an expansive and unique array of international cuisine. Set on a pristine strip of white sandy beach, all of our 485 lavish suites offer a contemporary experience with an earthy feel including luxurious amenities, stunning views, an in-room rolling bar, all complete with our signature Unlimited-Luxury® experience.WebBeds

name: Iberostar Tucan
address: Avda. Xaman-Ha, Lote Hotelero No 2, 77710 Playa del Carmen, Quintana Roo
description: Facing the beachfront, Iberostar Tucan offers 5-star accommodation in Playa del Carmen and has a garden, terrace and restaurant. The accommodation provides a range of water sports facilities, as well as a bar and a tennis court. The resort features an outdoor swimming pool, fitness centre, evening entertainment and a kids' club. The resort will provide guests with air-conditioned rooms offering a wardrobe, a safety deposit box, a flat-screen TV, a balcony and a private bathroom with a shower. At Iberostar Tucan the rooms are fitted with bed linen and towels. A continental breakfast is available each morning at the accommodation. Iberostar Tucan offers a children's playground. You can play billiards at the resort. Speaking German, English, Spanish and French at the 24-hour front desk, staff are always on hand to help. Playacar Beach is 1.1 km from Iberostar Tucan, while ADO International Bus Station is 3.1 km from the property. The nearest airport is Cozumel International, 32 km from the accommodation, and the property offers a paid airport shuttle service.

name: Iberostar Quetzal
address: Avenida Xaman Ha Lote Hotelero No. 2, 77710 Playa del Carmen, Quintana Roo
description: Facing the beachfront, Iberostar Quetzal offers 5-star accommodation in Playa del Carmen and has a garden, restaurant and bar. Located around 400 metres from Playacar Beach, the resort with free WiFi is also 3.3 km away from ADO International Bus Station. The resort offers an outdoor swimming pool, evening entertainment and a kids' club. At the resort, all rooms include a desk, a flat-screen TV, a private bathroom, bed linen and towels. Iberostar Quetzal provides some units with sea views, and every room is fitted with a coffee machine. All guest rooms at the accommodation feature air conditioning and a wardrobe. With staff speaking German, English, Spanish and French, non-stop information is available at the reception. Playa del Carmen Maritime Terminal is 3.4 km from Iberostar Quetzal, while Church of Guadalupe is 8.1 km from the property. The nearest airport is Cozumel International Airport, 32 km from the resort.

name: Banyan Tree Mayakoba
address: Carretera Federal Chetumal Puerto Juarez Km 298, 77710 Playa del Carmen, Quintana Roo
description: Live a unique experience in an exclusive resort in the Riviera Maya, Banyan Tree Mayakoba Triple AAA 5 Diamond resort has private villas with swimming pools surrounded by vegetation offering you a stay of luxury and harmony. Diamond resort, because we believe in our mission: to offer you the most memorable vacations of your life and a simply unforgettable experience.accorhotels.com

name: The St. Regis Kanai Resort, Riviera Maya
address: Paseo Kanai 15, 77730 Playa del Carmen, Quintana Roo
description: Discover an exceptional address at The St. Regis Kanai Resort, Riviera Maya. We offer you a central location near Cancun and Playa Del Carmen. Find our vacation resort built on a natural mangrove reserve, with a setting inspired by the neighboring Sian Ka’an Reserve, a UNESCO World Heritage Site in Quintana Roo. Take in sweeping ocean views from a 620-acre reserve set on the shores of Mexico’s Yucatan Peninsula. The Pleiades constellation inspired the circular architecture of our resort's avant-garde exterior, which floats above the canopy of the mangrove trees below. Each of our 124 rooms, suites and residences boasts dramatic views, along with bespoke furniture and a private terrace or plunge pool. Reserve one of our vacation packages and revel in our resort's unique range of culinary destinations and other experiences. From our signature St. Regis Butler Service to the state-of-the-art St. Regis Spa, every touchpoint allows time to stand still in this undiscovered slice of paradise in Mexico.Marriott

name: The Elements Oceanfront & Beachside Condo Hotel
address: Avenida Flamingo & Calle 46, 77710 Playa del Carmen, Quintana Roo
description: Moments from the Caribbean Sea and ancient ruins in Playa del Carmen, this property is surrounded by lush vegetation and offers fully furnished condos with fully equipped kitchens and ocean views. The Elements features a private beach, beach club and spacious outdoor pool. Guests will also enjoy the fully equipped fitness center and an on-site business center, both with ocean views. The one and 2 and 3 bedroom condos at the Elements offer flat-screen TVs and high-count linens. After a busy day, guests can relax on their private terrace or enjoy the evening breeze from the living room.

name: Impression Moxché by Secrets
address: Carr Tulum Playa Del Carmen km 294, 77714 Playa del Carmen, Quintana Roo
description: Set in Playa del Carmen, 1.3 km from Playa del Carmen Beach, Impression Moxché by Secrets - Adults Only offers accommodation with an outdoor swimming pool, free private parking, a garden and a terrace. 11 km from ADO International Bus Station and 11 km from Playa del Carmen Maritime Terminal, the property provides a private beach area, as well as a bar. The accommodation features room service, a 24-hour front desk and currency exchange for guests. Certain rooms will provide you with a kitchenette with a minibar. The daily breakfast offers continental, Full English/Irish or American options. At the resort you will find a restaurant serving French, Italian and Japanese cuisine. Vegetarian, dairy-free and vegan options can also be requested. You can play billiards, table tennis and tennis at this 5-star resort, and the area is popular for golfing. Guests can sing karaoke, plan their trips at the tour desk, or make use of the business centre. Church of Guadalupe is 7.4 km from Impression Moxché by Secrets - Adults Only, while Kantenah Bay is 41 km away. The nearest airport is Cozumel International, 43 km from the accommodation, and the property offers a paid airport shuttle service.

name: Sandos Playacar Select Club Adults Only
address: Paseo Xaman-ha Lote 1, 77710 Playa del Carmen, Quintana Roo
description: Located in Playacar, this beachfront property is next to a golf course and within 3 mi (5 km) of Quinta Avenida, Central Square, and Nuestra Senora del Carmen Catholic Church. El Camaleon Mayakoba Golf Course and Xpu-ha Beach are also within 20 mi (32 km).Expedia

name: El Dorado Casitas Royale by Karisma - Adults only
address: Km 45, Carretera Cancun - Tulum, 77710 Playa del Carmen, Quintana Roo
description: El Dorado Casitas Royale is an adults-only resort that features gourmet cuisine with the Gourmet Inclusive Experience, a full-service spa, and 13 swimming pools. The elegant and lavish suites are fully appointed and feature a DVD and CD library, personal concierge services from 08:00 until 17:00, a pillow menu and aromatherapy scents delivered in your room. The bright bedrooms offer mosquito nets over the canopy beds. The elegant bathrooms have double sinks and a shower. Some units have an outdoor shower or a hot tub. El Dorado Casitas Royal has an extensive selection of different appealing cuisines from around the world including 10 different restaurants offering world cuisine, contemporary Italian menus, a flavour from the Pacific, a Mediterranean fusion, Caribbean style, and Mexican cuisine. Pizzas and authentic Italian cooking are also offered. There are also 10 swim-up bars, 1 beach bar and 4 lounge bars available. Naay Spa is dividen into the Spa Royale and the Spa Casitas. Spa Royale is in the centre of the property, while Spa Casitas is a 20,000 sq-ft facility offering an extensive menu of traditional and alternative spa treatments. The Bonanza Ranch is the property's own stables with riding horses. There is a guided horseback tour through the jungle so guests can experience the true Riviera Maya beauty.

name: Thompson Beach House
address: Calle 8 y Playa, 77710 Playa del Carmen, Quintana Roo
description: With a stay at Thompson Beach House - a concept by Hyatt in Playa del Carmen (Downtown Playa del Carmen), you'll be steps from Playa del Carmen Main Beach and Quinta Avenida. Featured amenities include complimentary newspapers in the lobby, dry cleaning/laundry services, and a 24-hour front desk. A roundtrip airport shuttle is provided for a surcharge (available 24 hours), and self parking (subject to charges) is available onsite.Hotels.com

name: Grand Velas Riviera Maya
address: Carretera Cancun Tulum Km 62, 77710 Playa del Carmen, Quintana Roo
description: Enjoy the jungles mystique and endless ocean views at this resort for all ages. Discover a different side of the Mexican Caribbean in the Zen Grand Ambiance surrounded by pristine jungle, or opt for ocean breezes in the Ambassador Ambiance. Explore the entire resort with its SE Spa and have family-friendly restaurants; adults are invited to enjoy the Grand Class Ambiances three additional restaurants and infinity pool as well. Visit the Kids Clubs and Teens Club, go on an Eco-tour, play mini.iHotelier/iStay

name: Emiliano 42 Condos Boutique
address: Calle 42 Norte Emiliano 42 Condos Boutique, 77720 Playa del Carmen, Quintana Roo
description: Emiliano 42 Condos Boutique features a fitness room and a hot tub, as well as air-conditioned accommodation in the centre of Playa del Carmen, less than 1 km from Playa del Carmen Beach. Every unit has an equipped kitchen with a fridge, a living room with a sofa bed and flat-screen TV and private bathroom. An oven, a microwave and toaster are also available, as well as a coffee machine. A terrace is available for guests to use at the aparthotel. Playacar Beach is 2.4 km from Emiliano 42 Condos Boutique, while ADO International Bus Station is 2.4 km from the property. The nearest airport is Cozumel International Airport, 36 km from the accommodation.

name: Barceló Maya Riviera - Adults only
address: Carretera Chetumal Puerto Juárez Km. 266,3|Xpuha |Quintana Roo|México, Playa del Carmen, Quintana Roo
description: General description: The hotel Barcelo Maya Riviera (adults only), especially popular with honeymooners, is located around 20 km from Playa del Carmen. The following attractions can be reached from the hotel: Río Secreto. For mobility there is a taxi rank and a car rental company. The airport (CUN) is approx. 90 km away. The hotel and airport are linked by a shuttle (for a fee). Amenities: The beach hotel has 850 rooms in total. It offers its guests a reception (check-in from 15:00, check-out until 12:00), a lobby, a lift, air conditioning, a free parking area and a money changing facility. For the meals, there are 5 restaurants. In a total 5 bars, you can relax in good company. WiFi is available for free. Laundry / ironing service is available for a fee. For the concierge service the hotel charges a fee (where applicable). Pool: At the pool bar you can get refreshing beverages. Sport and Leisure: Sports and entertainment: Tennis (where applicable, for a fee). Additional information: Additional fees may apply for certain facilities, amenities or activities. Some services depend on the local climatic conditions and the season. Languages spoken: English and Spanish. Some services and facilities might be closed or offered with restrictions due to COVID19 Prevention measurement. Changes can be applied without previous notice.Ticket Package

name: Barceló Maya Tropical
address: Ctra. Federal Chetumal-Puerto Juarez KM 266.3, 77750 Playa del Carmen, Quintana Roo
description: General description: The beach hotel Barcelo Maya Tropical is especially popular with honeymooners and is approx. 76 km from the airport (CUN). For mobility there is a car rental company. Amenities: It is equipped with a reception, a lobby with bar, an air conditioning as well as discotheque. For the meals, there are 16 restaurants and a snack bar. In a total 15 bars, you can relax in good company. WiFi is available for free. Room service, laundry / ironing service and medical service are available for a fee. Pool: In the outdoor area of the hotel you will find one pool. Here, there are sun loungers and sun umbrellas for free available. At the pool bar you can get refreshing beverages. Sport and Leisure: Sports and entertainment: Fitness. Spa area available for a fee. Child supervision: mini club for children (from 4 - 12 years) and babysitting (for a fee). Additional information: Additional fees may apply for certain facilities, amenities or activities. Some services depend on the local climatic conditions and the season. Languages spoken: English and Spanish. Accepted methods of payment: Visa, American Express and Euro / MasterCard. Some services and facilities might be closed or offered with restrictions due to COVID19 Prevention measurement. Changes can be applied without previous notice.Ticket Package

name: Hotel Delfin
address: 5th Avenida Con Calle 6 Norte, 77710 Playa del Carmen, Quintana Roo
description: In a prime location in the 5th Avenue district of Playa del Carmen, Hotel Delfin is located 300 metres from ADO International Bus Station, 600 metres from Playa del Carmen Maritime Terminal and 3.3 km from Church of Guadalupe. Each accommodation at the 2-star hotel has city views and free WiFi. The property is 800 metres from the city centre and 600 metres from Playacar Beach. All guest rooms in the hotel are fitted with a coffee machine. Complete with a private bathroom equipped with a hairdryer, all units at Hotel Delfin have a flat-screen TV and air conditioning, and some rooms will provide you with a terrace. At the accommodation every room is fitted with bed linen and towels. Xel Ha is 47 km from Hotel Delfin, while Kantenah Bay is 33 km away. The nearest airport is Cozumel International Airport, 34 km from the hotel.

name: Cache Hotel Boutique - Adults Only
address: Calle 10 Norte Esquina Con 15va Av Mz 10, 77710 Playa del Carmen, Quintana Roo
description: Attractively located in Playa del Carmen, Hotel Cache features air-conditioned rooms, an outdoor swimming pool, free WiFi and a terrace. Each accommodation at the 3-star hotel has city views, and guests can enjoy access to a bar and to a casino. Private parking is available on site. At the hotel, rooms are equipped with a wardrobe, a flat-screen TV, a private bathroom, bed linen and towels. Every room comes with a safety deposit box, while some rooms include a balcony and others also boast sea views. All rooms will provide guests with a fridge. The daily breakfast offers à la carte, continental or American options. At Hotel Cache you will find a restaurant serving Mediterranean and Mexican cuisine. Vegetarian, dairy-free and vegan options can also be requested. Languages spoken at the 24-hour front desk include Arabic, English, Spanish and French. Popular points of interest near the accommodation include Playacar Beach, ADO International Bus Station and Playa del Carmen Maritime Terminal. The nearest airport is Cozumel International, 34 km from Hotel Cache, and the property offers a paid airport shuttle service.

name: Barcelo Maya Palace
address: Carretera Chetumal Pto Juarez Km 266.3. Riviera Maya, 77750 Playa del Carmen, Quintana Roo
description: No description found

name: Paamul Hotel
address: Carretera Federal Cancun -Tulum Km 85, 77710 Playa del Carmen, Quintana Roo
description: Set in Paamul, a few steps from Paamul beach, Paamul Hotel offers accommodation with a terrace, free private parking, a restaurant and a bar. The property is located 18 km from Playa del Carmen Maritime Terminal, 18 km from ADO International Bus Station and 46 km from Tulum Archeological Site. The hotel also provides free WiFi as well as a paid airport shuttle service. The hotel will provide guests with air-conditioned rooms offering a desk, a coffee machine, a fridge, a microwave, a safety deposit box, a flat-screen TV and a private bathroom with a shower. Some rooms also offer a kitchen with a stovetop and a toaster. All guest rooms feature a wardrobe. American and gluten-free breakfast options are available every morning at Paamul Hotel. Church of Guadalupe is 21 km from the accommodation, while Xel Ha is 31 km from the property. The nearest airport is Cozumel International Airport, 33 km from Paamul Hotel.

name: Pelicano Inn Playa del Carmen - Beachfront Hotel
address: Calle 8 Norte Entre 5a Avenida, 77710 Playa del Carmen, Quintana Roo
description: This oceanfront hotel in Playa del Carmen is located directly on the beach, one block from the famous Fifth Avenue entertainment area. The hotel offers a 24-hour front desk and free Wi-Fi. Every guest room at the Hotel Pelicano Inn Playa del Carmen features a private bathroom and air conditioning. Some rooms provide a view of the ocean. Guests can enjoy a meal in the restaurant or a drink in the bar at the Playa del Carmen Pelicano.

name: Hotel Punta Esmeralda
address: Calle 110 Ente Avenidas 10 Y 15, 77717 Playa del Carmen, Quintana Roo
description: Hotel Punta Esmeralda is located in Playa del Carmen, 2 km from Playa del Carmen Beach and 4.6 km from ADO International Bus Station. With a terrace, the 3-star hotel has air-conditioned rooms with free WiFi, each with a private bathroom. The accommodation provides airport transfers, while a car rental service is also available. At the hotel, the rooms include a wardrobe. Each room includes a safety deposit box, while selected rooms are fitted with a balcony and others also offer city views. All units in Hotel Punta Esmeralda are equipped with a flat-screen TV and free toiletries. With staff speaking English and Spanish, around the clock guidance is available at the reception. Playa del Carmen Maritime Terminal is 5.2 km from the accommodation, while Church of Guadalupe is 1.3 km away. The nearest airport is Cozumel International Airport, 37 km from Hotel Punta Esmeralda.

name: Hotel Esencia
address: Carretera Cancún-Tulum Km. 265, 77750 Xpu Há, Quintana Roo
description: Offering direct access to Xpu-Ha Beach, Hotel Esencia offers beautiful rooms and suites with terraces set amongst attractive gardens. It features a spa, 2 large outdoor swimming pools and an à la carte restaurant. All air-conditioned accommodation has bright, attractive décor. Each suite and room has a flat-screen TV and an iPod docking station. The Garden Restaurant serves a selection of regional and international cuisine. The hotel also offers Mexican cookery classes. The Esencia’s spa features a plunge pool, sauna and hot tub. Treatments include massage and facials. The Riviera Maya coastline is ideal for diving and snorkelling. Guests can visit the Mayan ruins at Tulum, as well as the resort of Playa del Carmen, which can be reached within 15 minutes by car.

name: Heaven at Hard Rock Hotel Riviera Maya - Adults Only
address: Km. 72 Carretera Cancun-Tulum, 77710 Puerto Aventuras, Quintana Roo
description: This stylish holiday resort is located in one of the most impressive and inspiring places of the world, right next to the beach and facing the warm waters of the Caribbean Sea. The resort offers an authentic rock star lifestyle experience for adults only and has its own private beach as well as various swimming pools. The guest rooms are tastefully decorated and feature high-quality amenities, such as a relaxing hydro spa tub for couples, which will ensure an unforgettable stay on the Riviera Maya. Travellers who stay in this hotel may enjoy exquisite national and international cuisine choosing between different on-site restaurants and bars. The establishment boasts a wide range of activities and leisure options during the day, and when the sun goes down guests may enjoy fantastic parties with professional DJ's. The spa, with its huge variety of treatments, is the best place to relax and recharge batteries after being dancing all night.FarePortal

name: Barcelo Maya Caribe
address: Carretera Chetumal, 77750 Xpu Há, Quintana Roo
description: No description found

name: Mahekal Beach Front Resort & Spa
address: 38 St And The Beach, 77710 Playa del Carmen, Quintana Roo
description: Welcome to the enchanting and magical Mayan paradise in Playa del Carmen - Mexico. Nestled between lush tropical gardens rich in flora and fauna - the vast white sandy beach and the indescribable turquoise water of the Caribbean Sea await you. Among the most pictures accommodations in Playa del Carmen - the Mahekal Beach Resort is a beach front hotel with exquisite hotel accommodation with unique spa services and exciting Mayan excursions to the nearby ancient ruins. The resort has well established roots in the area and provides the perfect getaways for guests since 1982. Our resort welcomes guests to our unique 4 star resort retreat with thatched roof palapas and spacious - oceanfront rooms featuring private terraces or balconies. The resort is located on the Caribbean Sea with a gorgeous beach in Playa del Carmen along the Riviera Maya. Convenient to the shops and restaurants of 5th Avenue - or "La Quinta" as it is known locally.iHotelier/iStay

name: Bluebay Grand Esmeralda
address: Carr. Chetumal - Puerto Juárez Km 300, 77710 Playa del Carmen, Quintana Roo
description: The hotel is located on the Riviera Mayan about 15 minutes north of Playa del Carmen, with its restaurants, bars, exciting nightlife and shopping opportunities, and 35 minutes from Cancun International Airport. Links to public transport can be found 15 min from the hotel. Property located on 180-acres of beachfront overlooking the azure waters of Mexico's beautiful Mayan RivieraWebBeds

name: Ocean Zen Suites on 5th Avenue - Adults Only
address: Quinta Avenida (5a) Calle 68 y 70, 77728 Playa del Carmen, Quintana Roo
description: Ocean Zen Suites - Eco Luxury Hotel Suites with amazing roof top infinity pool with views of the Turquoise blue waters of the Mexican Caribbean over lush green trees. Punta Esmeralda, Clean powdery sandy quiet beaches and turquoise waters are less than 400 meters away or less than 5 minutes stroll. Yes, we are located on peaceful and quiet famous NEW Quinta (5th Avenue), away from the Noisy bars. Neighborhood local restaurants, Fruit/Vegetable market and 24-Hour store are less than 5 minutes’ walk. Relax on the roof top terrace infinity pool area, watching the amazing sunrise or lay in the sunbeds at night gazing at the moon and stars and feeling the cool breeze. We are an Eco-Friendly Boutique hotel, AC units at Ocean Zen suites are Solar powered. Hot water tanks are European design with hot water on demand. FREE- Harvested and Purified RAIN WATER supplied to OCEAN ZEN SUITES by RAIN-HA, tested by Mexican Government Authority Labs. Please bring your own bottle (BYOB) for FREE Refills of Pure Rain water. No acid rain, No chemicals. Modern bathroom with, water saving showers and toilets. Shampoo, Body wash, Conditioner and hand soap are all naturally made from pure honey by Mayans from Mayans Village. Each of Suite has FREE Premium Internet, with direct connect and your own FREE WIFI allocated to that Suite. FREE WIFI by the Infinity pool and all common area. Our Eco- Luxury Suites are ergonomically designed for your comfort. Combination decor and atmosphere with modern Eco technology. All beds, patio and pool furniture are hand made by Mayans with local solid hard wood. Come stay with us experience Ocean Zen Suits -where Eco Luxury meets Serenity.

name: The Riviera Maya EDITION (SM) at Kanai
address: Paseo Kanai 14, 77730 Playa del Carmen, Quintana Roo
description: Located on a pristine beachfront site, in the blissful stretch of Caribbean coastline, The Riviera Maya EDITION at Kanai features 182 guestrooms and suites situated within the luxurious Kanai development, and home to five food and beverage outlets including a signature restaurant, pool bar and beach club, destination spa and an expansive 4000 sqm Penthouse Suite. In addition to multiple meeting spaces, the hotel also houses an extensive outdoor deck for large-scale events and parties. The Riviera Maya EDITION at Kanai is the first property in Mexico, proud representative of the collection of individualized, customized, one-of-a-kind hotels conceived by Ian Schrager in collaboration with Marriott International.Marriott

name: Hotel All Riviera
address: Calle 2 Norte Entre 5th Avenida y ZF.M, 77710 Playa del Carmen, Quintana Roo
description: This boutique property is on the beach of Playa del Carmen and is within a 5-minute walk of 5th Avenue. The property offers spa services and rooms with free Wi-Fi. All Riviera Resort rooms include a refrigerator and dining area. The rooms are equipped with a balcony and most rooms offer views of the Caribbean Sea. Guests at the All Riviera can swim in the outdoor pool or relax on the beach. The All Riviera is within a 5-minute walk of downtown Playa del Carmen. The hotel is located in the Mayan Riviera.

name: Maui hostel playa del carmen
address: 1 Avenida Nte, 77710 Playa del Carmen, Quintana Roo
description: Maui hostel playa del carmen provides accommodation within 400 metres of the centre of Playa del Carmen, with free WiFi, and a kitchen with a microwave, a fridge and a stovetop. The aparthotel offers a sun terrace. Guests can enjoy the rooftop pool at Maui hostel playa del carmen. Popular points of interest near the accommodation include Playa del Carmen Beach, Playacar Beach and ADO International Bus Station. The nearest airport is Cozumel International, 35 km from Maui hostel playa del carmen, and the property offers a paid airport shuttle service.

name: Hilton Playa Del Carmen Adult Only Resort
address: Av. Constituyentes No. 2, 77710 Playa del Carmen, Quintana Roo
description: This hotel is located 55.5km away from Cancun International Airport. Major attractions near the location include Xplor Park (8.5km), Xcaret Park (10km) and Rio Secreto (19km). Facilities and amenities include bar, concierge facilities, free Wi-Fi, gym/fitness facilities, lounge area, restaurant, sauna and spa facilities. Rooms feature Wi-Fi, room service, mini bar/fridge, TV, safe in room, telephone, air conditioning, tea/cofee maker, hairdryer, balcony/terrace and radio. Please note that some of the above facilities may be closed due to weather / seasonal conditions. Address: Avenida Constituyentes 2 Gonzalo Guerrero, 77710 Playa del Carmen Mexico.Ticket Package

name: Hyatt Zilara Riviera Maya
address: Carretera Federal 387, KM 299, 77710 Playa del Carmen, Quintana Roo
description: With a stay at Hyatt Zilara Riviera Maya in Playa del Carmen, you'll be 5.5 mi (8.9 km) from Maroma Beach and 7.1 mi (11.4 km) from Quinta Alegría Shopping Mall. Featured amenities include a computer station, dry cleaning/laundry services, and a 24-hour front desk. Planning an event in Playa del Carmen? This aparthotel has facilities measuring 6747 square feet (627 square meters), including conference space. Free valet parking is available onsite.Hotels.com

name: Ocean Front El Faro Reef 304
address: 1a. Av. Nte. calle 10 Norte C. 10 y Z. Federal, 77710 Playa del Carmen, Quintana Roo
description: Situated 700 metres from the centre of Playa del Carmen, 700 metres from Playacar Beach, Ocean Front El Faro Reef 304 features air-conditioned accommodation with a terrace, an infinity pool and a fitness centre. Complimentary WiFi is provided. Each unit comes with a sofa, a seating area, a flat-screen TV with streaming services, a well-fitted kitchen, a safety deposit box and a private bathroom with a hair dryer. A dishwasher, an oven and microwave are also available, as well as a coffee machine. Guests can also relax in the garden. ADO International Bus Station is 600 metres from the aparthotel, while Playa del Carmen Maritime Terminal is 700 metres from the property. The nearest airport is Cozumel International Airport, 35 km from Ocean Front El Faro Reef 304.

name: Barceló Maya Colonial
address: Ctra. Federal Chetumal-Puerto Juarez KM 266.3, 77750 Playa del Carmen, Quintana Roo
description: Mexico's beautiful Mayan Riviera is home to this exceptional beachfront resort, offering a variety of on-site activities and entertainment along with numerous dining options, spacious swimming pools and comfortable accommodations. Begin the day at the Barcelo Maya Colonial Beach with a delicious meal from one of the 7 on-site restaurants. Enjoy lounging by one of 3 swimming pools or participate in the resort's daily group activities, including horseback riding through the forest. Relax with a cocktail from one of the Maya Colonial's numerous on-site bars or take advantage of on-site diving lessons, kayak rentals or basketball courts. Finish the evening at the on-site nightclub or play a game on the resort's mini-golf course.

name: Kinta Kan Beach Hotel Boutique Playa del Carmen
address: Calle 2 Norte Entre 5ta avenida y Zona Federal Marítima, 77710 Playa del Carmen, Quintana Roo
description: Well situated in Playa del Carmen, Kinta Kan Beach Hotel Boutique Playa del Carmen offers air-conditioned rooms, an outdoor swimming pool, free WiFi and a garden. This 4-star hotel offers a shared lounge and room service. Certain units at the property feature a terrace with a sea view. At the hotel, rooms have a wardrobe and a flat-screen TV. All rooms are equipped with a private bathroom equipped with a shower and free toiletries, while some rooms come with a kitchen fitted with a fridge. At Kinta Kan Beach Hotel Boutique Playa del Carmen the rooms include bed linen and towels. A continental breakfast is available every morning at the accommodation. At Kinta Kan Beach Hotel Boutique Playa del Carmen you will find a restaurant serving Seafood cuisine. Vegetarian, dairy-free and gluten-free options can also be requested. Speaking English and Spanish at the 24-hour front desk, staff are always at hand to help. Popular points of interest near the hotel include Playacar Beach, ADO International Bus Station and Playa del Carmen Maritime Terminal. The nearest airport is Cozumel International, 34 km from Kinta Kan Beach Hotel Boutique Playa del Carmen, and the property offers a paid airport shuttle service.

name: Playacar Palace
address: Fraccionamiento Playacar Km 62.5 Bahia Del Espiritu, 77710 Playa del Carmen, Quintana Roo
description: No description found

name: El Dorado Royale a Spa Resort by Karisma - Adults only
address: Km 45 Carretera Cancun, 77710 Playa del Carmen, Quintana Roo
description: El Dorado Royale is an adults-only, beachfront resort on The Riviera Maya. It features 14 restaurants with the exclusive Gourmet Inclusive Experience, more than a mile of a secluded beach area, a lavish spa, and concierge services. A wonderful cenote site can be found within 25 minutes' drive away. The elegant suites and rooms at El Dorado Royal offer an indoor hot tub, bathrobes, cable TV, a furnished terrace with a small table, 2 chairs and a hammock upon request, plus a private bathroom including a hairdryer. The minibar is daily stocked with beer, soft drinks and water, plus there is a coffee maker available. The Gourmet Inclusive Experience includes flavours from the international cuisine, contemporary Italian dishes, Pacific flavours, Caribbean selection, authentic Mexican delights, traditional Italian and gourmet pizzas, among others. Naay Spa is divided into Spa Royale and Spa Casitas. Both offer an extensive menu of traditional and alternative spa treatments. Other activities that guests can enjoy at this resort include diving lessons and the rental of the equipment, a gift shop on site, WiFi access, tennis lessons and wave runners to cruise the sea.

name: Andaz Mayakoba a Concept By Hyatt - All Inclusive
address: Carretera Federal Cancun - Playa Del Carmen Km 298, 77710 Playa del Carmen, Quintana Roo
description: No description found

name: Valentin Imperial Maya - Adults Only
address: Carr.Fed.307 Chetumal, 77710 Playa del Carmen, Quintana Roo
description: This luxurious resort is located 25 minutes from International Cancun Airport, 30 minutes from Cancun and only 20 minutes from Playa del Carmen. With more than half a mile white sand beach, located in Playa del Secreto (The Secret Beach) in the Riviera Maya.WebBeds

name: Secrets Maroma Beach Riviera Cancun - Adults Only
address: Carretera Federal 307 Chetumal-Cancún, 77710 Playa del Carmen, Quintana Roo
description: The hotel is situated on the coast of the Yucatan Peninsula, on one of the world's best beach. It lies a mere 50 km south of Cancun, 32 km south of Cancun International Airport and is surrounded by vibrant coral reefs, soft sand White adventurous attractions.WebBeds

name: Fairmont Mayakoba
address: Carretera Federal Cancun - Playa Del Carmen Km 298, 77710 Playa del Carmen, Quintana Roo
description: With the Caribbean Sea on one side and 240 acres of tropical forest and sparkling lagoons on all others, Fairmont Mayakoba is a hidden paradise on the coast of Mexico. Our private gated resort invites you to reconnect with nature, while enjoying all the services and facilities of an AAA Five Diamond hotel. Delve into your lush surroundings, play in the waves at nearby Playa del Carmen or relax poolside at our 5-star Riviera Maya hotel. Then dine on a decadent variety of cuisines in our restaurants.accorhotels.com

name: Hidden Beach Resort Au Naturel by Karisma - Adults only
address: KM.95 Carretera Cancun-Tulum Kantenah, 77710 Playa del Carmen, Quintana Roo
description: Hidden Beach Resort Au Naturel Club Gourmet All In is perfectly located for both business and leisure guests in Playa Del Carmen. The property offers a high standard of service and amenities to suit the individual needs of all travelers. To be found at the property are 24-hour front desk, valet parking, room service, airport transfer, car hire. Each guestroom is elegantly furnished and equipped with handy amenities. Recuperate from a full day of sightseeing in the comfort of your room, or take advantage of the hot tub, private beach, fitness center, sauna, outdoor pool. Convenience and comfort make Hidden Beach Resort Au Naturel Club Gourmet All In the perfect choice for your stay in Playa Del Carmen.Agoda

name: La Divina by Aldea Thai
address: Av. Cozumel Mz.81 Lt. 1, 77710 Playa del Carmen, Quintana Roo
description: This elegant and sophisticated property set in Playa del Carmen offers an outdoor swimming pool, free Wi-Fi access, and is located only 160 metres from vibrant 5th Avenue and 10 metres from the white-sand beaches of the Caribbean. The spacious and comfortable apartments have a modern décor and feature balconies offering partial ocean view, flat-screen TVs, cable channels and a fully equipped kitchen, plus seating and dining areas. Toiletries are provided within the bathrooms with showers. The penthouse apartments feature roof top terraces with private plunge pools. Popular 5th Avenue offers a wide variety of restaurants, bars and nightlife entertainment. Also, Mamitas Beach Club, Kool Beach Club & Coralina are located in front of the property. The friendly staff at La Divina by Aldea Thai can help the guests with information about interesting touristic spots, like Tulum Archaeological Site, or Xcaret Nature Park, both reachable in 45 minutes and 15 minutes’ drive respectively. Activities like scuba diving, golf and snorkelling can be arranged, extra fees might be applicable.

name: Andaz Mayakoba - a concept by Hyatt
address: Carretera Federal Cancun-Playa Del Carmen Km. 298, 77710 Playa del Carmen, Quintana Roo
description: Offering two outdoor pools and a private beach area, Upscale Andaz Mayakoba is in the gated Mayakoba complex in Playa del Carmen. The resort has a spa centre and sauna, and guests can enjoy a meal at one of the 4 restaurants. Free WiFi is provided throughout the property and free private parking is available on this pet friendly property. Every room at this resort is air conditioned and comes with a flat-screen TV with cable channels. Some units have a seating area to relax in after a busy day. Certain units include views of the sea or lake. Rooms include a private bathroom. Extras include bathrobes and slippers. The restaurant offer cover fine dinning with Casa Amate, fresh and local ingredients with relaxed environment with Cocina Milagro, and beachfront street and sea food at Sotavento and Tinta del Pulpo. Room service is also available 24 hours. This elegant resort offers a Mayan Oasis Spa with 6 massage rooms and a hydrotherapy circuit centre and sauna and access to El Camaleón Golf Club and the Mayakoba Tennis Centre. This resort has water sports facilities and free use of bicycles is available. You can engage in various activities, such as golfing and snorkelling. Playa del Carmen Maritime Terminal is 9 km from Andaz Mayakoba, while Church of Guadalupe is 6 km from the property. The nearest airport is Cancun International Airport, 40 km from Andaz Mayakoba - a concept by Hyatt. This hotel only accepts credit cards, debit cards and, where applicable, other contactless forms of payment. It is a cash-free environment

name: El Taj Oceanfront & Beachside Condo Hotel
address: 1 Norte Esquina Calle 14 Norte, 77710 Playa del Carmen, Quintana Roo
description: Set in tropical gardens next to Playa del Carmen Beach, these luxury suites offer access to an infinity pool, outdoor hot tub and spa. Guests enjoy free access to the beach club. Suites at El Taj Oceanfront Condo Hotel offer a large terrace. El Taj property is composed by two buildings. Oceanfront suites offer sea views and direct beach access, while Beachside suites overlook the pool, fish pond and gardens. Each spacious suite has elegant Bali-inspired décor and a typical palapa thatched roof. A Smart TV and modern kitchen are included. Gourmet cuisine is served in El Taj Condo’s ASI restaurant, while pizzas, snacks and drinks are available in the beach bar. You can also request a private chef to prepare meals in your suite. El Taj is situated in central Playa del Carmen, just 2 blocks from Fifth Avenue. This popular boulevard is home to boutiques, pavement cafés, bars and restaurants.

name: Palmaia, The House of AiA
address: Paseo Xaman Ha, Lt.1, Playacar, 77710 Playa del Carmen, Quintana Roo
description: Strategically situated at the tail end of the most beautiful beach in the Riviera Maya, The House of AïA brings us Palmaïa, an exclusive beach enclave focused on connecting us to nature, ourselves, and the sanctity of life. Every effort was taken to ensure the original landscape remains untouched to feel the healing authenticity of old-growth trees and naturally occurring, cool-water cenotes. All guests reside in ocean-front suites: some with swim-out access to the infinity pools, others with sweeping views of the sea, and a few nestled among the ocean-side mangroves. Guests also enjoy high-end amenities without sacrificing environmentally friendly practices, while the restaurants offer the best cuisine in the region, extensive plant-based options, and impeccable style. But even still, the real jewels are the Architects of Life personal growth program and the Rituals of Sound series. The Hotel is Pet Friendly, for more information contact the hotel.FarePortal

name: Aldea Thai Penthouses By Smart
address: Calle 28 Norte Entre, 77720 Playa del Carmen, Quintana Roo
description: Situated 100 metres from Playa del Carmen Beach and 1.8 km from Playacar Beach in the centre of Playa del Carmen, Aldea Thai Penthouses By SMART features accommodation with free WiFi and free private parking. Some accommodation includes a terrace with sea views, a fully equipped kitchen and a shared bathroom with bath. At the aparthotel guests are welcome to take advantage of a hot tub, spa facilities and a fitness room. In addition to a year-round outdoor pool, Aldea Thai Penthouses By SMART also offers a an indoor play area. ADO International Bus Station is 1.6 km from the accommodation, while Playa del Carmen Maritime Terminal is 1.8 km from the property. The nearest airport is Cozumel International, 36 km from Aldea Thai Penthouses By SMART, and the property offers a paid airport shuttle service.

name: Grand Hyatt Playa Del Carmen Resort
address: 1a Avenida Esquina Calle 26, 77710 Playa del Carmen, Quintana Roo
description: Offering 3 ocean-front outdoor pools and a spa and wellness centre with spectacular architecture resembling a Cenote, Grand Hyatt Playa del Carmen Resort is located in Mamita’s Beach. The design concept has crafted natural elements, artwork, textures and light. The rooms will provide you with a TV, air conditioning, iPod dock and seating area. Complete with a coffee machine, the dining area also has a dining table. Featuring a bath or shower, private bathroom also comes with a hairdryer. Extras include free WiFi in all rooms and floor-to-ceiling windows featuring amazing views. At Grand Hyatt Playa del Carmen Resort you will find 2 restaurants serving steak specialties and international cuisine, 3 bars and a fitness centre. Unique food and beverage concepts and signature offerings from our restaurants and bars, such as Sushi "n" Raw Seafood Bar and La Cocina, will set the stage for you to enjoy the local flavors of Grand Hyatt Playa del Carmen Resort. Room Service available 24 hours. Other facilities offered at the property include water sports facilities, meeting facilities, Beauty Salon and a games room. There is also a multi-purpose ballroom plus fifteen meeting rooms and various indoor and outdoor pre-function areas for events. If you feel like visiting the surroundings, check out the famous shopping, gastronomic and party scenes at La Quinta Avenida. This resort is 55.5 km from Cancún International Airporttional Airport.

name: Hotel Kinbe
address: Calle 10 Norte Entre 1 Y 5 Avenida, 77710 Playa del Carmen, Quintana Roo
description: This distinctly stylish hotel is located just 50 metres from the sandy beach in the heart of Playa del Carmen with shopping, dining and nightlife available nearby. Kinbe Hotel features a relaxing lush garden setting. Feel at home in the impressive lobby and comfortable guestrooms. Enjoy the sparkling waters of the nearby ocean or take a swim in the hotel's pool boasting a striking waterfall. Hotel Kinbe offers coffee, apples and water at check-in. The helpful, multilingual 24-hour front desk is happy to provide guests with information about the area. After a day exploring Playa del Carmen, relax with an in-room massage at Kinbe.

name: Ocean Riviera Paradise
address: Carretera Federal Chetumal Cancun KM 296, Predio Montecarlos Lotes 7, 7-1 y Predio Punta Bete Lote 15-5, 77511 Playa del Carmen, Quintana Roo
description: No description found

name: Unico 20°n 87°w - Riviera Maya - Adults Only
address: Manzana 22 Carretera Chetumal-Pto Juare, 77710 Puerto Aventuras, Quintana Roo
description: Set in Akumal, a few steps from Kantenah Beach, Unico Hotel Riviera Maya Adults Only offers accommodation with an outdoor swimming pool, free private parking, a garden and a terrace. 30 km from Playa del Carmen Maritime Terminal and 30 km from ADO International Bus Station, the property provides a range of water sports facilities, as well as a bar. The accommodation features a 24-hour front desk, airport transfers, room service and free WiFi throughout the property. At the resort, the rooms include a wardrobe. All rooms have air conditioning, and some units at Unico Hotel Riviera Maya Adults Only have a balcony. All guest rooms feature a safety deposit box. Breakfast is available every morning, and includes continental, Full English/Irish and vegetarian options. At the accommodation you will find a restaurant serving American, Indonesian and Italian cuisine. Vegetarian, vegan and gluten-free options can also be requested. You can play billiards at this 5-star resort, and the area is popular for snorkelling. Tulum Archeological Site is 33 km from Unico Hotel Riviera Maya Adults Only, while Xel Ha is 19 km from the property. The nearest airport is Cozumel International Airport, 45 km from the resort.

name: Hotel Colibri Beach
address: 1 Avenida Norte Bis Entre 10 y 12, 77710 Playa del Carmen, Quintana Roo
description: Featuring Mexican-style décor, Hotel Colibri Beach is a sea-front boutique hotel located in the heart of Playa del Carmen. The city's famous 5th avenue, world-known for its restaurants, bars, discotheques and shopping areas are only one block away. Featuring 33 picturesque rooms, Colibri Beach Hotel has everything you need for a delightful stay in this Caribbean destination. Most rooms face the tropical garden and some of them have gorgeous ocean views. All rooms offer complimentary wifi, fan, air conditioning and some rooms include a balcony with hammocks and views of the garden or street. All bathrooms are private and full equiped. It also has available bathroom accessories you may need at a minimum cost, such as toothbrush and paste, hair brush, shaver, etc. All breakfasts are included and served with your feet in the sand at Lido Beach Club which offers a palapa thatched roof and some of the best Playa's food with an international inspiration with a Mexican touch cuisine. A wide variety of cocktails at the Palapa Swing Bar and live bands are also a big attraction to all guests. Sunbeds may be available based on beach lenght and sea tide. It features 14 linear parking spaces, and it is necessary to leave the keys at the reception when parking. The hotel also has available several tours upon request at the front-desk, from Chitchen-Itza to cenotes, the Tulum beach front, Xcaret entertaining parks, water sports, and many others. Cancún International Airport is 50 minutes drive away from the hotel and another 50 minutes away from Tulum.

name: Ocean Maya Royale - Adults Only
address: Carretera Federal Chetumal, km. 299, 77710 Playa del Carmen, Quintana Roo
description: Offering endless activities, international on-site dining and full-service spa treatments, Ocean Maya Royale provides oceanfront accommodations. Guests can enjoy direct beach access in the heart of the Mayan Riviera, near Cozumel and Cancun. With an on-site scuba diving center and daily organized activities, there is something for everyone at the Ocean Maya Royale. Take advantage of the resort's nightly live entertainment or relax in one of the 2 oceanfront swimming pools. Sample a large variety of dining options while staying at the Ocean Maya Royale, including authentic Japanese cuisine and traditional Mexican dishes. The resort also features several on-site bars. In the area surrounding the Ocean Maya Royale, discover a large variety of recreational activities, including jet skiing and guided jungle tours. The area is also home to one of the world's largest coral reefs, and is ideal for scuba diving or snorkeling.

name: Sandos Caracol Eco Experience Resort
address: Carretera Cancún Chetumal Km. 295, 77710 Playa del Carmen, Quintana Roo
description: This property is located on the beachfront. Featuring a spa, 9 restaurants and 2 outdoor pools and an water park with 29 water slides for kids and adults, Sandos Caracol Eco Resort is set on Playa del Carmen Beach, overlooking Cozumel Island. Some of the rooms have balconies overlooking the Caribbean Sea. Sandos Caracol Eco Resort is in beautiful gardens and features bright accommodations. All rooms have flat-screen TVs, air conditioning and a minibar. Wi-Fi is available for free in public areas. Sandos Caracol Eco Resort features lessons, including yoga and scuba diving. There is also a water sports center, evening entertainment, and children's and teen's activities. Spa facilities include a sauna, hot tub and gym. There are 3 buffetes including international and itialian, plus 6 a la carte restaurants (Oriental, Mexican Brazilian, Italian, Mediterranean and stake house), we also have a 24 hour snack bar available. There are ecological activities for the whole family. The Sandos Caracol Eco Resort is 3.2 km from the Church of Guadalupe and a 45-minute drive from Cancún Airport. The Gran Coral Golf Riviera Maya is located within the same estate as the Sandos.

name: Illusion Boutique Hotel by Xperience Hotels - Adults Only
address: 8th St North, Playa del Carmen, Quintana Roo
description: Located a 2 minutes’ walk from the beach and 2 minutes from the 5th Avenue. Illusion Boutique Hotel By BFH features a rooftop terrace with a plunge pool, massage room. Free WiFi access is available at all areas. The hotels offers air-conditioned rooms & ventilator, flat-screen cable TV and interior garden patio, street, roof top or sea views rooms. Guests can visit nearby attractions with help from the tour desk. llusion Boutique Hotel by By BFH is just a 15-minute drive from Xcaret Eco Theme Park. The bus station is only 10 minutes' way walking and Cancun International Airport is 40 minutes’ drive away.

name: Dreams Puerto Aventuras Resort & Spa
address: Km 269.5 Carretera Chetumal, 77750 Puerto Aventuras, Quintana Roo
description: Set on Quintana Beach and featuring a spa and outdoor pool, Dreams Aventuras Riviera Maya Resort has luxurious rooms overlooking its gardens, or the sea. It has 6 restaurants and a diving centre. The spacious, air-conditioned rooms at the Puerto Aventuras Resort & Spa come with a balcony. Each has subtle, Mexican-style décor with tiled floors. All feature a flat-screen TV and minibar. A range of cuisine including Italian, Mexican and grilled seafood, is on offer in the Aventuras’ restaurants. There is also an international buffet and a beach bar. Guests can relax on the charming terrace, which features thatched palapa shelters. The on-site spa has a range of hot tubs, plunge pools and steam baths. Treatments on offer include reflexology, aromatherapy and wraps. The resort is a 20-minute drive from the Mayan ruins at Tulum. The popular resort of Playa del Carmen is less than 20 km away. Family friendly hotel, please see fine print for additional information.

name: Hard Rock Hotel Riviera Maya
address: Km 72, Carretera Cancun-Chetumal, 77701 Puerto Aventuras, Quintana Roo
description: Bordered by a private white sand beach and lush tropical landscapes, this decadent luxury resort pulls out all the stops for an unreal holiday for families and couples alike. The resort is situated near Playa del Carmen on the Mayan Riviera, less than 50 kilometres from the pre-Colombian Mayan ruins of Tulum. Visitors will have many opportunities to explore the area with excursions to Tulum and Chichen-Itza archaeological sites, and can swim with dolphins or even tour the Hard Rock sister hotel in Cancun. Each room offers generous proportions, a hydro spa bathtub, private balcony, and a range of state-of-the-art amenities, all decorated with vibrant colours and textures. Guests will delight in the private beach, children's pool and family pool, and the resort also offers a sophisticated and opulent adults-only hotel with four pools, nine imaginative restaurants and six lavish bars exclusively for adults. generalViajes Exito Hotels

name: Winday Hotel - Cerca 5a Avenida
address: Ave Cmt, esq. Av 25 Colonia Zazil Ha, 77720 Playa del Carmen, Quintana Roo
description: Featuring 4-star accommodation, WinDay Hotel is situated in Playa del Carmen, 2.3 km from Playacar Beach and 2.7 km from ADO International Bus Station. Featuring a terrace, the 4-star hotel has air-conditioned rooms with free WiFi, each with a private bathroom. The property is 800 metres from Playa del Carmen Beach, and within 1 km of the city centre. At the hotel, the rooms are fitted with a desk and a flat-screen TV. The rooms include a safety deposit box, while some rooms are fitted with a balcony and others also feature city views. At WinDay Hotel each room comes with bed linen and towels. Speaking English and Spanish at the 24-hour front desk, staff are ready to help around the clock. Playa del Carmen Maritime Terminal is 3.3 km from the accommodation, while Church of Guadalupe is less than 1 km from the property. The nearest airport is Cozumel International, 36 km from WinDay Hotel, and the property offers a paid airport shuttle service.

name: Blue Diamond Luxury Boutique Hotel Adults Only
address: Km. 298.8 Carretera #307, 77710 Playa del Carmen, Quintana Roo
description: "Blue Diamond Luxury Boutique has 4 Diamond Award Resort, is set in tropical gardens in the Riviera Maya. It offers attractive Suites, a spa, 3 outdoor pools, golf course nearby. Blue Diamond Luxury Boutique suites have a terrace or garden, some with private pool, and include views of the Caribbean Sea, cenotes or lagoons. All have a plasma TV, CD and DVD player and a rain shower. The hotel offers a wide variety of food options. There are 3 restaurants and a tapas bar, as well as a lounge bar, cafeteria and poolside snack bar. Also room service is available with extra charge. The resort has a gym, while the spa provides beauty therapies. Other activities include yoga, pilates and watsu. There is also a boutique and a beauty salon. Cancun International Airport is 35 minutes’ drive from the Blue Diamond Luxury Boutique."

name: Hotel Kay Adults Only
address: Calle 2 Norte, entre 5a Avenida y Zfm, 77710 Playa del Carmen, Quintana Roo
description: The adults-only Hotel Kay is located next to the beach in Playa del Carmen, and offers a hot tub and sun terrace. The air-conditioned rooms have private balconies with partial sea views. Each bright, functional room at Hotel Kay has free Wi-Fi, flat-screen cable TV and a safe. Bathrooms include free toiletries. Hotel Kay is just 30 metres from the famous 5th Avenue, where you can find a wide range of shops, international restaurants and lively bars. Hotel Kay is a 2-minute walk from Playa del Carmen Bus Station and the ferry terminal for Cozumel Island. Cancun International Airport is a 30-minute drive away.

name: Barceló Maya Beach
address: Carr Chetumal Puerto Juarez Km 266.3, 77750 Xpu Há, Quintana Roo
description: No description found

name: Pueblito Escondido Luxury Condo Hotel
address: Av. 38 Norte Col. Centro, 77710 Playa del Carmen, Quintana Roo
description: Rooms Make yourself comfortable in this air-conditioned apartment, featuring a kitchen with a full-sized refrigerator/freezer and an oven. There's a private balcony. Complimentary wireless Internet access keeps you connected, and a flat-screen television is provided for your entertainment. Conveniences include a separate sitting area and a microwave. Amenities Enjoy recreation amenities such as an outdoor pool or take in the view from a terrace. Business}, Other Amenities Free self parking is available onsite. Property Location With a stay at this apartment in Playa del Carmen (Downtown Playa del Carmen), you'll be a 5-minute walk from Playa del Carmen Main Beach and 11 minutes by foot from Quinta Avenida. This apartment is 6.9 mi (11.1 km) from Xcaret Eco Theme Park and 0.1 mi (0.1 km) from Mamitas Beach. Mandatory Charges You'll be asked to pay the following charges at the property: Deposit: USD 250 per stay We have included all charges provided to us by the property. Check-In Checkin starts at 3:00 PM Checkin end at 10:00 PM The minimum age of Checkin 18 Extra-person charges may apply and vary depending on property policy Government-issued photo identification and a credit card, debit card, or cash deposit may be required at check-in for incidental charges Special requests are subject to availability upon check-in and may incur additional charges; special requests cannot be guaranteed This property accepts credit cards There is no front desk at this property. This property doesn't offer after-hours check-in. To make arrangements for check-in please contact the property at least 24 hours before arrival using the information on the booking confirmation. Guests must contact the property for check-in instructions. Check-Out Checkout is done at 12:00 PM Pets Pets not allowed General instructions No rollaway/extra beds available No cribs (infant beds) available No elevators Professional property host/managerViajes Exito Hotels
